verses.roman:
e-saba la-iyā caitanya-prabhura vihāra
e-saba la-iyā karena vāñchita pracāra

synonyms: e-saba—all these; la-iyā—taking; caitanya-prabhura—of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; vihāra—pastimes; e-saba—all of them; la-iyā—taking; karena—does; vāñchita pracāra—spreading His mission.
translation: With all of them Lord Caitanya performed His pastimes, and with them He spread His mission.
